about_the_game:
Enter a world where blocks defy norms! Stack, grow, shrink, and solidify blocks in a puzzle game that’s all about strategy and creativity to make the tallest tower possible as demands keep rising. How tall will your tower become?


Key features of the game include:
  • Dynamic Blocks: There are many different types of blocks that come in different weights, shapes and sizes. They are unstable, constantly changing size until Solidified.
  • Size Control: Get coins for making the tower taller and taller. Spend them to make placed blocks grow, shrink, and even solidify at your command.
  • Strategic Gameplay: The game starts with a simple task - stacking blocks. But the shifting blocks with different sizes requires you to place each block carefully as fast as possible and to spend coins when needed to make it stand tall. Easy to learn, hard to master.
  • Leader board and score: The taller the tower, the better your score. Compete against everyone else making a tower for the best score on the leader board.

How tall will your tower become?
